languages.text: Сложно сказать, сколько времени длится молебен — несколько часов или несколько дней. В какой-то момент ваше естество переполняет жар и сила, а затем... чужая воля надламывается. Искаженный диск исчезает с радаров пустотного корабля, словно его никогда и не было, и наступает долгожданная тишина. Медленно оправляясь от произошедшего, на капитанский мостик начинают поступать донесения — в неравной борьбе вы потеряли треть команды, и понадобится немало времени, чтобы привести в чувство тех, кому посчастливилось выжить. Слава Вольному Торговцу!

traits.locale_text: Сложно сказать, сколько времени длится молебен — несколько часов или несколько дней. В какой-то момент ваше естество переполняет жар и сила, а затем... чужая воля надламывается. Искаженный диск исчезает с радаров пустотного корабля, словно его никогда и не было, и наступает долгожданная тишина. Медленно оправляясь от произошедшего, на капитанский мостик начинают поступать донесения — в неравной борьбе вы потеряли треть команды, и понадобится немало времени, чтобы привести в чувство тех, кому посчастливилось выжить. Слава Вольному Торговцу!

languages.text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

traits.locale_text: It's hard to say whether the prayer service has lasted several hours, or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and that is when... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's radars, as if it was never there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

languages.text: 很难说这场祈祷仪式究竟是持续了几个小时，还是几天。不知过了多久，你感觉热量与力量从你的灵魂本质中溢出，随后……入侵者的意志动摇了。扭曲的圆盘从虚空舰的俄歇矩阵中消失了，就仿佛它从来没出现过一样。到了最后，一切都安静了下来。当每个人都从刚刚经历的恐怖场景中慢慢恢复过来之后，舰长的舰桥收到了无数份报告。在这场双方力量并不均等的战斗中，你失去了你三分之一的船员，而那些幸存者要经过相当长的时间才能恢复过来。愿行商浪人别来无恙！
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

traits.locale_text: 很难说这场祈祷仪式究竟是持续了几个小时，还是几天。不知过了多久，你感觉热量与力量从你的灵魂本质中溢出，随后……入侵者的意志动摇了。扭曲的圆盘从虚空舰的俄歇矩阵中消失了，就仿佛它从来没出现过一样。到了最后，一切都安静了下来。当每个人都从刚刚经历的恐怖场景中慢慢恢复过来之后，舰长的舰桥收到了无数份报告。在这场双方力量并不均等的战斗中，你失去了你三分之一的船员，而那些幸存者要经过相当长的时间才能恢复过来。愿行商浪人别来无恙！

languages.text: Es difícil decir si el servicio religioso se extiende durante horas o durante días. En algún momento, sientes que tu misma esencia se llena de calor y poder, y después... la voluntad intrusa retrocede. El disco distorsionado se desvanece de los augures de la nave, como si nunca hubiera existido y, por fin, todo queda en silencio. Mientras todos se recupera con lentitud de lo ocurrido, empiezan a llegar informes al puente del capitán. Has perdido a un tercio de la tripulación en este enfrentamiento injusto, y los afortunados supervivientes tardarán en recuperarse. ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

traits.locale_text: Es difícil decir si el servicio religioso se extiende durante horas o durante días. En algún momento, sientes que tu misma esencia se llena de calor y poder, y después... la voluntad intrusa retrocede. El disco distorsionado se desvanece de los augures de la nave, como si nunca hubiera existido y, por fin, todo queda en silencio. Mientras todos se recupera con lentitud de lo ocurrido, empiezan a llegar informes al puente del capitán. Has perdido a un tercio de la tripulación en este enfrentamiento injusto, y los afortunados supervivientes tardarán en recuperarse. ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!

languages.text: 祈りから数時間たったのか、あるいは数日たったのか、よくわからない。突如、自分の真髄が熱とパワーで溢れ出すのを感じた。そして…他の意識は入ることができない。歪んだ円盤はまるで存在しなかったかのようにヴォイドシップのスキャナーから消え去り、ようやくすべてが静かになった。全員が徐々に回復していく中、艦橋に報告が入る。不平等な戦いでクルーの3分の1を失い、幸運にも生き残った者たちが戻ってくるにはかなりの時間がかかりそうだ。ローグトレーダー万歳！
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

traits.locale_text: 祈りから数時間たったのか、あるいは数日たったのか、よくわからない。突如、自分の真髄が熱とパワーで溢れ出すのを感じた。そして…他の意識は入ることができない。歪んだ円盤はまるで存在しなかったかのようにヴォイドシップのスキャナーから消え去り、ようやくすべてが静かになった。全員が徐々に回復していく中、艦橋に報告が入る。不平等な戦いでクルーの3分の1を失い、幸運にも生き残った者たちが戻ってくるにはかなりの時間がかかりそうだ。ローグトレーダー万歳！

languages.text: Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob das Gebet mehrere Stunde oder mehrere Tage gedauert hat. Irgendwann spürst du, wie deine grundlegende Essenz vor Hitze und Macht überkocht, und dann ... schwindet der fremde Wille, der in dich eingedrungen ist. Die verzerrte Scheibe verschwindet vom Blick der Auguren des Raumschiffs, als wäre sie nie da gewesen, und endlich ist alles still. Während sich alle langsam von dem Geschehen erholen, tröpfeln nach und nach Berichte auf der Brücke ein. Du hast in dem ungleichen Kampf ein Drittel deiner Crew verloren, und die Überlebenden werden eine ganze Weile brauchen, um sich zu erholen. Gesegnet sei {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}!
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

languages.text: Vous n'arrivez pas à déterminer si la cérémonie de prière a duré plusieurs heures ou plusieurs jours. À un moment, vous sentez votre essence même déborder de chaleur et de puissance, c'est alors... que l'intrus chancèle. Le disque distordu disparaît des augures du croiseur stellaire comme s'il n'avait jamais été là, et enfin, le calme revient partout. Tandis que chacun se remet péniblement de ce qui vient de se passer, les rapports commencent à affluer sur la passerelle de commandement. Vous avez perdu un tiers de votre équipage lors de ce combat déloyal, et les chanceux qui s'en sont tirés auront besoin de beaucoup de temps pour s'en remettre. Gloire {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} !
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!

languages.text: Ayinin birkaç saat mi yoksa birkaç gün mü sürdüğünü anlamak zor. Bir noktada öz varlığının ısıyla ve güçle dolup taştığını hissediyorsun. Sonrasındaysa… İstilacı irade sarsılıyor. Bozulmuş disk, sanki hiç orada olmamış gibi uçsuz gemisinin alametlerinden kayboluyor ve nihayet her şey sessizliğe bürünüyor. Herkes toparlanırken kaptan köprüsüne raporlar ulaşmaya başlıyor. Bu adaletsiz mücadelede mürettebatının üçte birini kaybetmiş bulunuyorsun. Sağ kalanların toparlanması ise epey zaman alacak. Yaşasın Hür Tacir!
languages.original_text: It is hard to tell if the prayer service has lasted several hours or several days. At some point, you feel your very essence overflow with heat and power, and then... the intruding will falters. The distorted disc vanishes from the voidship's augurs, as if it had never been there, and at long last, everything is quiet. As everyone slowly recovers from what just happened, reports begin to come in to the captain's bridge. You've lost a third of your crew in the unequal fight, and the fortunate survivors are going to take quite some time to come round. All hail the Rogue Trader!
